title: Healthlynked
description:
Enter HealthLynked—the first comprehensive data-sharing service for member patients and the healthcare providers who serve them. The service is absolutely free to patients. It consolidates detailed medical information in one password-protected, secure and safe online location and simplifies interactions with physicians.
Best of all, by making your most current medical information available to participating providers authorized to see it, you enable physicians to better diagnose and treat medical conditions.  For patients, the system provides the following benefits:
•	An electronic health records that travels everywhere.
•	It’s available to view or download 24/7 on a web-enabled computer or mobile device.
•	HealthLynked is so easy to use, patients do not need to be technology-savvy.
•	HealthLynked members experience shorter wait times.
•	Members avoid redundant office paperwork.
•	By creating their own personal, portable medical record, patients and their providers can gain access to complete health information through an easy, online system.
•	If you need to see a doctor locally or away from home, you can share comprehensive medical history instantly.
•	Healthcare providers, wherever patients see them, will be able to make better-informed medical decisions to improve health care.
•	By having possession of accurate medical records, you will help reduce the potential of medical errors or adverse drug reactions.
•	You become a more active participant in their care.
•	HealthLynked medical records require a strong password and are maintained by the highest encryption standards.
•	Patient name, social security number, birth date, and other identifiable pieces of information are each stored separately.
•	Firewalls and encryption at rest protect all data.
•	Only patients and those they authorize will have access to medical records, which may be revoke at any time.
